scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:css && ELEVENTY_ENV=production eleventy
scripts.dev: ELEVENTY_ENV=development npm run watch:css & ELEVENTY_ENV=development eleventy --serve
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development npm run watch:css & ELEVENTY_ENV=development eleventy --serve
scripts.serve:prod: ELEVENTY_ENV=production npm run watch:css & ELEVENTY_ENV=production eleventy --serve
